title: OP DC while in RANKED?
body: When 4 people from each team dc's in RANKED. and you're (sup) the last with their adc  xD{{champion:412}} VS {{champion:67}}

replies.body: There was an issue this morning that was the likely cause of these disconnects. [We've posted a retrospective of this issue here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XHGFrU9j-follow-up-on-connection-issues-5032015), as well as yesterday's issue.
"ill be the A because everyone else will probably DC for me" - crusader charlie
go ad and carry your dc team

haha yeah happenning to everyone, GG rito!!! XD

mine was in ranked also just at the start of a team fight!
